Title: Object: Le Repos en Egypte
Series: Le Musée Français
Description: The rest of the flight into Egypt, with the Virgin holding the Child while St Joseph looks on at the left, after a painting then thought to be by Guido Reni but by Simone Cantarini. c.1803/06 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: From 'Le Musée Français' (see 1875,0410.469 for comment). After the painting in the Louvre (inv. 175) from Louis XVI's collection which although traditionally attributed to Reni is undoubtedly by Cantarini who also made an etching of the composition (Bartsch XIX.126.6; BM impression 1876,0212.25).
